fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Trade, Business and Industry, Taxation, Single market
eu_initiatives: Solvency II, ATA, IDD, International Insurance Programmes, OECD-Beps papers, permanent EIOPA contact
organisation_name: European Captive Insurance and Reinsurance Owners Association (ECIROA)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: The protection and development of the interest of our members (owners of captive insurance companies) including representation of members in discussions with official and regulatory bodies.  Our goal is the protection and development of the european captive industry.
